page.title: 10STEWARTON-PLACES OF WORSHIP
page.content: There are 2 Church of Scotland churches.St. Columba's whose minister is Rev Philip McCardel, was the former parish church and now has a membership of 1240 and 80% attendance. It is surrounded by the old town graveyard. John Knox's minister is Rev George Campbell, with a membership of 640 and 76% attendance.This church often has visitors from overseas to join in the worship. Behind this church is "The Cottage", a house to meet and talk. This is open every day for anyone who wishes to drop in. The Kirk Session has been instrumental in opening it this year. There is a Congregational Church at top of Avenue Street.Roman Catholic Worshippers meet in Our Lady of St. John which has a very good youth club, Focus. Minority religious members in the town are Baptists, Jehovah Witnesses and Episcopalians.
